about_the_game: “Take me out to the ball game…” Rep your favorite teams with the MLB Fan Pack! The DLC includes Toppers, Player Banners, and Flags for every current AL and NL team, an MLB-branded Flag and Player Banner, and a Baseball Rocket Boost.
detailed_description: “Take me out to the ball game…” Rep your favorite teams with the MLB Fan Pack! The DLC includes Toppers, Player Banners, and Flags for every current AL and NL team, an MLB-branded Flag and Player Banner, and a Baseball Rocket Boost.
legal_notice: MLB trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball. Visit MLB.com

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.4+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Iris Pro Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.4 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

name: Rocket League® - MLB Fan Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

short_description: “Take me out to the ball game…” Rep your favorite teams with the MLB Fan Pack! The DLC includes Toppers, Player Banners, and Flags for every current AL and NL team, an MLB-branded Flag and Player Banner, and a Baseball Rocket Boost.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Polish
